ygData.subject: Nothing special about pole or bait that I could see
ygData.msgSnippet: ... bait never ... I made a collapsible fishing pole and 20 animated bait and set off to raise my fishing which has lagged behind at skill 115.  Here s what I
ygData.messageBody:
> About the fishingpole and bait, is it true the pole never breaks and the
bait never
> goes away?

I made a collapsible fishing pole and 20 animated bait and set off to raise
my fishing
which has lagged behind at skill 115. Here's what I found:

1) I got mostly fish, but did get a rusty dagger like my 6th catch.
2) I did have casts catch nothing
3) I did lose a bait
4) I did break the pole (like 7th cast)
5) I did sell the rest of the bait and give up worrying about it. ;oP

Flintnilf Ironori
Gnome Wizard
Povar Server
